pages.text: Large, sprawling mazes that can be found beneath the Twilight Swamp biome. Locating one of these landmarks requires a good eye for terrain, as the entrance is hidden inside a hill the size of a Small Hollow Hill.

Large, sprawling mazes that can be found beneath the Twilight Swamp biome. Locating one of these landmarks requires a good eye for terrain, as the entrance is hidden inside a hill the size of a Small Hollow Hill.

With some dedication and some navigation, an adventurer may come across the lair of the Minoshroom. Locked behind wooden fences and surrounded in fungus appears to be some chests with some loot, guarded by the beast of the Labyrinth.
